vlive.korean: 이거 마녀야 왕비 - 마녀예요? No, it's the queen, the witch. - Is that the witch? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
vlive.english: No, it's the queen, the witch. - Is that the witch?

vlive.korean: [마녀 등장] 마녀다! [Witch appears] It's a witch! 듣기 View video TWICE : 미나 TV “미나리의 게임방송”
그냥 마녀김밥이나... They usually just get the normal kind. 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: They usually just get the normal kind.

vlive.korean: 마녀김밥에 교리김밥이라고 있는 거 알아? Do you know they sell a kimbap called "Gyori gimbap" at Witch's Kimbap? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: Do you know they sell a kimbap called "Gyori gimbap" at Witch's Kimbap?

vlive.korean: [#파괴왕에게도 #너무_강한 #마녀] 안 돼, 안 돼, 안 돼! [#The_witch #is_too_strong #for_the_destruction queen] No, no, no! 듣기 View video TWICE : 미나 TV “미나리의 게임방송”

examples.korean: The witch foretold that she would marry a prince. 발음듣기 그녀가 왕자와 결혼을 할 것이라고 마녀가 예언했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The witch foretold that she would marry a prince. 발음

examples.korean: stories about a wicked witch 발음듣기 사악한 마녀에 대한 이야기들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: stories about a wicked witch 발음

examples.korean: The prince was turned into a frog by the witch. 발음듣기 그 왕자는 마녀 때문에 개구리가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The prince was turned into a frog by the witch. 발음

examples.korean: Legend has it that the whole village had been cursed by a witch. 발음듣기 전설에 의하면 그 마을 전체가 한 마녀의 저주를 받았던 것으로 되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Legend has it that the whole village had been cursed by a witch. 발음

examples.korean: The witch cursed all the people in the village. 발음듣기 마녀는 그 마을의 모든 사람에게 저주를 퍼부었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The witch cursed all the people in the village. 발음
